I felt a shiver run down my spine as I thought about the Cretaceous-Paleogene extinction event that wiped out so many species. It was a concept I had only read about, but it felt eerily familiar. I didn't understand why these ancient creatures would be of any significance to me now, or how they fit into the world of books and words.
